name: Bookscape
description:
Entry for Mini Jame Gam #3

Super Quick! Not much time, I tried to make a top down camera like the first Zelda, but time was too short and I couldn't add another room :P

The camera system works though.

I'll continue this game in the Stop waiting for Godot Jam

I used this art pack Fanttasy Top Down Pixel Art Tileset by Zapchi
